segments.text: The sight of the overflowing sink makes my heart race; water everywhere is not good!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe the woman is still unbothered by it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's as if sheâ€™s living in an idyllic moment, ignoring the underlying chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are plotting their little cookie heist, and I feel like a spectator in a play.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every second they stay up there makes me hold my breath, waiting for something to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how close they are to disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, watching their excitement makes it hard not to smile even amidst the worry.
segments.speaker: PAR
